metadata.title: CVE-2023-52680 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ALSA:scarlett2: Add missing error checks to *_ctl_get() The *_ctl_get()functions which call scarlett2_update_*() were not checking the returnvalue. Fix to check the return value and pass to the caller.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
